threats: we will come to your house

your name will be in newspaper
coercion: you are legally bound to pay
we will keep calling every day
we will call your family daily
this is your absolute last chance
you are running out of time

your family members are also liable

harassment: how do you sleep at night

i do not wish to continue
take my number off your list
i refuse to continue this conversation
